title: Digital Media-Based Educational Content Development: Open Education and Fair Use Practices [Self-Directed]

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary education curricula and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: PBL course emphasizing project execution in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, with a focus on developing content applicable to elementary education settings.

learning_goals: They can explain open licensing and fair use principles required for developing educational digital content
They can design customized elementary social studies curriculum content by integrating diverse online/offline resources
They can create interactive learning materials accessible in smartphone environments

resources: Elementary Social Studies Curriculum Standards Framework
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
